news.title: Air fares and food prices push up inflation to 3.8% in July
news.summary: Prices are now rising slightly quicker than expected and at their fastest pace since January 2024.

news.title: More asylum hotels face legal challenge after court ruling
news.summary: Nigel Farage says Reform UK-controlled councils will do everything in their power to close the hotels.

news.title: Israel calls up 60,000 reservists ahead of planned Gaza City offensive
news.summary: The military says troops are already operating in some areas ahead of the planned operation to occupy all of the city.

news.title: Kneecap rapper arrives in court over terror charge
news.summary: Liam Óg Ó hAnnaidh was charged with a terror offence after allegedly displaying a flag in support of proscribed organisation Hezbollah.

news.title: MND left her without a voice. Eight seconds of scratchy audio gave it back to her
news.summary: Sarah Ezekiel was 34 with two children when motor neurone disease took away her ability to speak.

news.title: Kremlin plays down Zelensky talks as Trump warns Putin may not want to make deal
news.summary: The US president conceded the war in Ukraine was "tough to solve" after several days of high-level talks.

news.title: Actress Aubrey Plaza says grief is a 'giant ocean of awfulness'
news.summary: The US actress says life is "a daily struggle", seven months after husband Jeff Baena's suicide.

news.title: 'He fixes what needs fixing': Why Raducanu turned to Nadal's ex-coach
news.summary: Emma Raducanu recently appointed another full-time coach in Spaniard Francisco Roig - BBC Sport speaks to those who know him best.

news.title: Jewellery, cash or first cars: Do rewards boost exam grades?
